location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paper, with coloured annotations.Dimensions: 335 x 390mm.

mods.abstract: Relief map found at folio 74 of 'Reconnaissances in Mesopotamia, Kurdistan, North-West Persia and Luristan, Volume I', by F R Maunsell.The map shows the plateau of Amadiyeh [Al 'Amādīyah], and surrounding mountains, vegetation, ruins, and villages (Kwaneh, Mariska).The map contains the following references:• Town half in ruins.• Minaret.• Barracks• Graveyard and Tombs.• Christian Quarter.• Ziarat.• Low loopholed wall.• Gardens and irrigated cultivation by stream coloured green.
